alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 3:58AM AKST until February 18 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and rain occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches along the Glenn Highway northeast of Palmer, including Sutton. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley northeast of Palmer. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain is mixing with or changing over to snow from west to east across the Matanuska Valley this morning. Accumulations for much of the Valley will be less than a half inch, if any.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
